def_cn: (行为、态度等)一贯的，一致的，始终如一的
def_en: Someone who is consistent always behaves in the same way, has the same attitudes towards people or things, or achieves the same level of success in something.

def_cn: （观点等）一致的，吻合的，不矛盾的
def_en: If one fact or idea is consistent with another, they do not contradict each other.

def_cn: (观点或看法)前后一致的，连贯的
def_en: An argument or set of ideas that is consistent is one in which no part contradicts or conflicts with any other part.
